All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ANSI
Organizational interface for identifing classes that contain ANSI escape sequences and methods
AnsiGeneral
Contains general ANSI escape sequences and methods
AnsiText
Stores text formatting ANSI escape sequences
AnsiTextColours
Contains the escape sequences and methods for ANSI text colours
AnsiTextColours.BaseColour
The 8 basic colours
AnsiTextColours.ColourMode
Used for setting foreground or background for the methods in this class
CharacterMatcher
Defines sets of Characters that can be used for a variety of functions that include matching characters
Concat
Utility class for easily concatenating any number of objects.
Concat.ConcatBuilder
Build a new Concat object.
Concat.NullBehaviour
Contains the 2 options for dealing with null elements when concatenating
DateTimeUtils
Provides some util methods for working with Date and Time objects
DateTimeUtils.ClockType
Specifies whether to display times in a 12 or 24-hour format
EnumUtils
Provides a number of helper methods for working with enums
GeneralUtility
Provides easy of use methods, including better printing methods.
HashMapArrayList<K,V>
Wrapper class for a HashMap where the values are ArrayLists
HashMapCounter<K>
HashMap wrapper used for counting items.
ListUtils
Provides a number of helper methods for working with lists
NotImplementedException
RuntimeException thrown when non-implemented methods are invoked
NumberUtils
Provides a number of helper methods for working with numbers.
NumberUtils.NumberUtilsException
RuntimeException thrown by various methods in NumberUtils
Optional
Represents an optional parameter
ParameterChecks
Utility class for checking the validity of passed arguments in methods
StringUtils
Contains a variety of String utility methods
TypeCheck
Debugging class used to find the type of a given variable.
TypeCheck.Type
Enum representing the type of the variable passed into the type check
TypeCheck.TypeCheckResult
Used to store the result of any type checking method in the TypeCheck class
